fields.name: glossaryEntry
fields.label: Glossary entry
fields.description: Select a glossary entry

fields.name: body
fields.label: Content
fields.description: If you want to add a custom nutshell, enter it's content here and leave the Glossary entry field empty.

fields.name: children
fields.label: Text
fields.description: this is the collapsed nutshell text

fields.name: forceOpen
fields.label: Force open
fields.description: Enable to force the nutshell to be always open

fields.name: tweetLink
fields.label: Tweet Link
fields.description: Enter the link to the tweet. Example: If the full link is https://twitter.com/volkyeth/status/1605300170958282754?s=20&t=Sv3FCtHeVAOAO7Pcf6JH5g, use volkyeth/status/1605300170958282754 as the tweet link

fields.name: youTubeId
fields.label: YouTube video ID
fields.description: Enter the ID of the YouTube video. Example: If the full link is https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q8TXgCzxEnw, use Q8TXgCzxEnw as the ID

fields.name: skipTo
fields.label: Skip to
fields.description: Start the video at specific time
